channel.title: forcing WIndows to use just Whonix connections
channel.description:
can we force & torify all windows connections/communications to go through whonix (specially GW)?
similar projects that we can take the idea from and/or communicate with them about this idea:-
- [Tallow](https://reqrypt.org/tallow.html) drived [TorWall](https://github.com/basil00/TorWall) - [Tortilla](https://github.com/CrowdStrike/Tortilla)
- [Advanced Onion Router (advtor)](http://sourceforge.net/projects/advtor/)
